name: Baldi's Fun New School Remastered Legacy Versions
name_original: Baldi's Fun New School Remastered Legacy Versions
description:
Welcome To The Baldi's Fun New School Remastered Legacy Versions Page!

On this page, you can download and try out previous versions of Baldi's Fun New School Remastered. Ranging from early never before released Alpha and Beta development versions created for mobile devices to some of the most recent releases, there's a lot to choose from!

A modified version of the V1.0 demo (which allows you to play normally disabled gamemodes like Timed Mode and Discussion Area) is also included. And every released version except for V1.3 is included.

Just click or tap on the underlined text of the platform you want to play that version on to begin downloading or playing it! Videos are also welcome and encouraged on these legacy versions. The included versions are...

  • UNFINISHED DEMO [PLAY IN BROWSER]
  • ALPHA V0.7.3 [ANDROID]
  • ALPHA V0.7.5 [ANDROID]
  • ALPHA V0.7.6 [ANDROID]
  • BETA V0.8 [ANDROID]
  • V1.0 DEMO [WINDOWS]
  • (MODIFIED) V1.0 DEMO [WINDOWS]
  • V1.0 [WINDOWS] [ANDROID]
  • V1.1 [WINDOWS] | V1.1.1 [PLAY IN BROWSER]
  • V1.2 [WINDOWS] [ANDROID] [PLAY IN BROWSER]
  • V1.4 [WINDOWS 32 BIT 64 BIT] [MACOS] [LINUX] | V1.4.1 [ANDROID]
  • V1.4.2 [WINDOWS] [MACOS] [LINUX] [ANDROID] [BROWSER]
  • V1.4.3 DEVELOPMENT VERSION [WINDOWS]
  • V1.4.3 [WINDOWS] [MACOS] [LINUX] [ANDROID] [BROWSER]
  • V1.4.3.1 [WINDOWS] [MACOS] [LINUX] [ANDROID] [BROWSER]
  • V1.4.4 [ WINDOWS] [MACOS] [LINUX] [ANDROID] [BROWSER]

I hope you enjoy checking out these old versions of BFNS Remastered, and thanks to everyone who has played it since the release of the first version!

(C) 2021-2022 JohnsterSpaceProgram
